content:
I'm really interested in learning more about data visualization and statistical modeling. I think being able to present complex data in a clear and concise way will make a huge difference in how my findings are received at work. I'm also looking forward to learning more about tools like Tableau and Power BI.

As for sharing my new skills with others, that's a great idea! I think leading a training session or brown-bag lunch would be a great way to give back to my team and help them improve their skills as well. Plus, it would be a great opportunity for me to practice my public speaking skills in a more formal setting.
